Program_Title: Rep. Chris Smith's (R-NJ) Powerful Closing Statement in Pro-Life Special Order of Congress

Headlines: Pro-life hero Rep. Chris Smith (R-NJ), who has introduced the "No Taxpayer Funding for Abortion Act," gives a powerful closing statement in the pro-life special order of Congress.
